trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for viewers that are intended to display fixed or flow content (represented by a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument" />, respectively).
trans-unit.target: 고정 또는 유동 콘텐츠(각각 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> 또는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument" />로 표시됨)를 표시할 뷰어의 기본 클래스를 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> is a minimal base class, intended to provide only basic functionality that is common across document viewing scenarios.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> 문서 보기 시나리오에 공통 되는 기본 기능을 제공 하기 위한 최소한의 기본 클래스가입니다.

trans-unit.source: This base class provides no user interface.
trans-unit.target: 이 기본 클래스 없음 사용자 인터페이스를 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes base class values when called by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 파생 클래스에서 호출되는 경우 기본 클래스 값을 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: Cancels any current printing job.
Gets a value that indicates whether or not the viewer can jump to the next page in the current <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document" />.
trans-unit.target: 뷰어가 현재 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document" />의 다음 페이지로 점프할 수 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: **true** if the viewer can jump to the next page; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true** 뷰어에 다음 페이지로 이동할 수 있는 경우 이렇게 하지 않으면 **false**합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToNextPage" /> dependency property.
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToNextPage" /> dependency property key.

If you derive from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>, you need this key in order to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToNextPage%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 파생 하는 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>,이 키의 값을 설정 하려면 필요는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToNextPage%2A> 종속성 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%28System.Windows.DependencyPropertyKey%2CSystem.Object%29>, passing <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToNextPagePropertyKey> as the `key` parameter.
A page number to check for as a valid jump target.
trans-unit.target: 유효한 점프 대상인지 확인할 페이지 번호입니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether or the viewer is able to jump to the specified page number.
trans-unit.target: 뷰어에서 지정된 페이지 번호로 점프할 수 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether or the viewer is able to jump to the specified page number.
trans-unit.target: 뷰어에서 지정된 페이지 번호로 점프할 수 있는지 여부를 나타내는 부울 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether or not the viewer can jump to the previous page in the current <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document" />.
trans-unit.target: 뷰어가 현재 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document" />의 이전 페이지로 점프할 수 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: **true** if the viewer can jump to the previous page; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true** 뷰어 이전 페이지로 이동할 수 있는 경우 이렇게 하지 않으면 **false**합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToPreviousPage" /> dependency property.
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToPreviousPage" /> dependency property key.

If you derive from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>, you need this key in order to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToPreviousPage%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 파생 하는 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>,이 키의 값을 설정 하려면 필요는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToPreviousPage%2A> 종속성 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%28System.Windows.DependencyPropertyKey%2CSystem.Object%29>, passing <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToPreviousPagePropertyKey> as the `key` parameter.
Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.IDocumentPaginatorSource" /> to be paginated and displayed by the viewer.
trans-unit.target: 뷰어에서 페이지를 매기고 표시할 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.IDocumentPaginatorSource" />를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.IDocumentPaginatorSource" /> to be paginated and displayed by the viewer.
The default property is **null**.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document" /> dependency property.
Causes the viewer to jump to the first page of the current document (represented by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document" /> property).
trans-unit.target: 뷰어가 현재 문서(<see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document" /> 속성으로 표시됨)의 첫 번째 페이지로 점프하도록 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A dependency object from which to retrieve the value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage" />.
Returns the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage" /> attached property for a specified dependency object.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 종속성 개체에 대한 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage" /> 연결된 속성의 값을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage" /> attached property, read from the dependency object specified by *element*.
trans-unit.target: *요소*에서 지정한 종속성 개체에서 읽은 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage" /> 연결된 속성의 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The master page corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> object (in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews%2A> collection) that includes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A> attached property with a value of **true**.
trans-unit.target: 마스터 페이지에 해당 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> 개체 (에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews%2A> 컬렉션)를 포함 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A> 연결 된 속성의 값을 가진 **true**합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A>.
Raised if <paramref name="element" /> is <see langword="null" />.
Returns the current master <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView" /> for this viewer.

The current master <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView" /> for this viewer, or **null** if no master <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView" /> can be found.
trans-unit.target: 이 뷰어의 경우 현재 마스터 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView" />이며, 마스터 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView" />를 찾을 수 없는 경우 **null**입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> provides a viewport for a particular page of content (represented by an underlying <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage>).
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> 뷰포트 특정 콘텐츠 페이지에 대 한 제공 (로 표현 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage>).

trans-unit.source: The master page corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> object (in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews%2A> collection) that includes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A> attached property with a value of **true**.
trans-unit.target: 마스터 페이지에 해당 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> 개체 (에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews%2A> 컬렉션)를 포함 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A> 연결 된 속성의 값을 가진 **true**합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A>.

Returns <see langword="true" /> on the first call to <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.GetPageViewsCollection(System.Boolean@)" /> or if the collection has not changed since the previous <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.GetPageViewsCollection(System.Boolean@)" /> call; otherwise, <see langword="false" /> if the collection has changed since the last <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.GetPageViewsCollection(System.Boolean@)" /> call.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.GetPageViewsCollection(System.Boolean@)" />을 처음으로 호출하거나 이전 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.GetPageViewsCollection(System.Boolean@)" /> 호출 이후 컬렉션이 변경되지 않았으면 <see langword="true" />를 반환하고, 마지막 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.GetPageViewsCollection(System.Boolean@)" /> 호출 이후 컬렉션이 변경되었으면 <see langword="false" />를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new, read-only collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView" /> objects that are associated with the current display document (represented by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document" /> property).
trans-unit.target: 현재 표시 문서(<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView" /> 속성으로 표시됨)와 연결된 새 읽기 전용 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document" /> 개체 컬렉션을 만들어 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView" /> objects that are associated with the current display document.
trans-unit.target: 현재 표시 문서와 연결된 읽기 전용 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView" /> 개체 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> provides a viewport for a particular page of content (represented by an underlying <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage>).
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> 뷰포트 특정 콘텐츠 페이지에 대 한 제공 (로 표현 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage>).

trans-unit.source: The number of the page to jump to.
Causes the viewer to jump to a specified page number.
trans-unit.target: 뷰어가 지정된 페이지 번호로 점프하도록 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If *pageNumber* specifies an invalid page to go to (as indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToPage%2A> method), this method does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 경우 *pageNumber* 잘못 된 페이지를 지정 합니다 (표시 된 대로 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToPage%2A> 메서드),이 메서드는 아무 작업도 수행 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Causes the working <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews" /> collection to be re-built.
trans-unit.target: 작업 중인 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews" /> 컬렉션이 다시 빌드되도록 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage" /> attached property
Causes the viewer to jump to the last page in the current document (represented by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document" /> property).
trans-unit.target: 뷰어가 현재 문서(<see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document" /> 속성으로 표시됨)의 마지막 페이지로 점프하도록 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator for the children in the logical tree of the viewer.
trans-unit.target: 뷰어의 논리적 트리에서 자식에 대한 열거자를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> object that can be used to enumerate the logical children of the viewer.
trans-unit.target: 뷰어의 논리적 자식을 반복하는 데 사용할 수 있는 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
If the viewer has no logical children, an empty enumerator is returned.
trans-unit.target: 뷰어의 논리적 자식이 없으면 빈 열거자를 반환 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the page number for the current master page.
trans-unit.target: 현재 마스터 페이지의 페이지 번호를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The page number for the current master page, or **0** if no Document is currently loaded.
trans-unit.target: 현재 마스터 페이지의 페이지 번호 또는 **0** 문서가 현재 로드 된 경우.

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.

The master page corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> object (in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews%2A> collection) that includes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A> attached property with a value of **true**.
trans-unit.target: 마스터 페이지에 해당 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> 개체 (에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews%2A> 컬렉션)를 포함 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A> 연결 된 속성의 값을 가진 **true**합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A>.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.MasterPageNumber" /> dependency property.
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.MasterPageNumber" /> dependency property key.

If you derive from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>, you need this key in order to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.MasterPageNumber%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 파생 하는 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>,이 키의 값을 설정 하려면 필요는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.MasterPageNumber%2A> 종속성 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%28System.Windows.DependencyPropertyKey%2CSystem.Object%29>, passing <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.MasterPageNumberPropertyKey> as the `key` parameter.
Causes the viewer to jump to the next page in the current document (represented by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document" /> property).
trans-unit.target: 뷰어가 현재 문서(<see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document" /> 속성으로 표시됨)의 다음 페이지로 점프하도록 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Builds the visual tree for the viewer.
This method is invoked whenever <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드가 호출 될 때마다 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> 라고 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnApplyTemplate%2A>.
The element from which the <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView" /> event originated.
A rectangular region, in the coordinate space of <c>element</c>, which should be made visible.
trans-unit.target: <c>요소</c>의 좌표 공간에서 표시해야 할 사각형 영역입니다.

trans-unit.source: The page number for the page that contains <c>element</c>.
Invoked whenever the <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView" /> event reaches an element derived from this class in its route.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView" /> 이벤트가 해당 경로에서 이 클래스에서 파생된 요소에 도달할 때마다 호출됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: 이 이벤트에 대한 클래스 처리를 추가하려면 이 메서드를 구현합니다.

trans-unit.source: The base implementation of this method will cause the viewer to jump to the page indicated by *pageNumber*.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드의 기본 구현을 뷰어를 가리키는 페이지로 이동 하면 *pageNumber*합니다.

trans-unit.source: Raised if *element* is **null**.
Handles the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.CancelPrint" /> routed command.
This method is called when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.CancelPrint%2A> command is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 호출한 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.CancelPrint%2A> 명령을 호출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> object for this viewer.
trans-unit.target: 이 뷰어에 대한 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> 개체를 만들어 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> object for this viewer.
This method overrides <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A>.
Called whenever the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document" /> property is modified.

This method causes the working set of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> objects (represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews%2A> property) to be invalidated and regenerated.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 사용 하면 작업 집합 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> 개체 (나타내는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews%2A> 속성)을 무효화 하 고 다시 생성 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The previous DPI scale setting.
The new DPI scale setting.
Invoked when the DPI scale changes.
Sets the DPI of the flow document to the new scale.
trans-unit.target: 유동 문서의 DPI를 새 배율로 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: Handles the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.FirstPage" /> routed command.

The <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.FirstPage%2A> routed command causes the viewer to jump to the first page in the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.FirstPage%2A> 라우트된 명령을 사용 하면 현재에서 첫 번째 페이지로 이동할 수 뷰어가 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The number of the page to jump to.
Handles the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.GoToPage" /> routed command.

The <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.GoToPage%2A> routed command cause the viewer to jump to an indicated page number in the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.GoToPage%2A> 라우트된 명령 인해 이동 하려면 현재 표시 된 페이지 번호를 뷰어 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToPage%2A> method indicates whether or not a specified page number is a valid page to jump to in the current document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToPage%2A> 메서드 지정된 된 페이지 번호는 현재 문서에서 이동할 수 있는 올바른 페이지 하는지 여부를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: If *pageNumber* specifies an invalid page to go to (as indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToPage%2A> method), this method does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 경우 *pageNumber* 잘못 된 페이지를 지정 합니다 (표시 된 대로 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToPage%2A> 메서드),이 메서드는 아무 작업도 수행 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Handles the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.LastPage" /> routed command.

The <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.LastPage%2A> routed command causes the viewer to jump to the last page in the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.LastPage%2A> 라우트된 명령을 사용 하면 현재에서 페이지를 마지막으로 이동 하려면 뷰어가 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Called whenever the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.MasterPageNumber" /> property is modified.

The master page corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> object (in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews%2A> collection) that includes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A> attached property with a value of **true**.
trans-unit.target: 마스터 페이지에 해당 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> 개체 (에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews%2A> 컬렉션)를 포함 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A> 연결 된 속성의 값을 가진 **true**합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A>.
Handles the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.NextPage" /> routed command.

The <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.NextPage%2A> routed command causes the viewer to jump to the next page (if available) in the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.NextPage%2A> 라우트된 명령을 사용 하면 현재에서 (있는 경우) 다음 페이지로 이동 하려면 뷰어가 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToNextPage%2A> property indicates whether or not there is a next page to go to in the current document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToNextPage%2A> 속성은 현재 문서에서 다음 페이지 인지 여부를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Called whenever the working set of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView" /> objects for this viewer (represented by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews" /> property) is modified.
trans-unit.target: 이 뷰어의 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView" /> 개체(<see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews" /> 속성으로 표시됨) 작업 집합이 수정될 때마다 호출됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Handles the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.PreviousPage" /> routed command.

The <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.PreviousPage%2A> routed command causes the viewer to jump to the next page (if available) in the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.PreviousPage%2A> 라우트된 명령을 사용 하면 현재에서 (있는 경우) 다음 페이지로 이동 하려면 뷰어가 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToPreviousPage%2A> property indicates whether or not there is a previous page to go to in the current document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToPreviousPage%2A> 속성은 현재 문서에서 이전 페이지 인지 여부를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Handles the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Print" /> routed command.
This method is called whenever the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Print%2A> command is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 호출 될 때마다는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Print%2A> 명령을 호출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of pages in the current <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document" />.
The number of pages in the current document, or **0** if no document is currently loaded.
trans-unit.target: 현재 문서에서 페이지 수가 또는 **0** 문서가 현재 로드 된 경우.

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
This value is updated as content is paginated.
trans-unit.target: 이 값은 콘텐츠 페이지를 매길 때 업데이트 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Because flow content has no notion of fixed pages, the value of this property may change if the viewer is resized, or if the content being displayed is modified.
trans-unit.target: 유동 콘텐츠를이 고정 된 페이지가의 개념이 없습니다 이기 때문에 뷰어 크기를 조정 하거나 표시 되 고 수정 하 고이 속성의 값이 변경 될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageCount" /> dependency property.
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageCount" /> dependency property key.

If you derive from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>, you need this key in order to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageCount%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 파생 하는 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>,이 키의 값을 설정 하려면 필요는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageCount%2A> 종속성 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%28System.Windows.DependencyPropertyKey%2CSystem.Object%29>, passing <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageCountPropertyKey> as the `key` parameter.
Gets a read-only collection of the active <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView" /> objects contained within the viewer.
trans-unit.target: 뷰어 내에 포함된 활성 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView" /> 개체의 읽기 전용 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection of the active <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView" /> objects contained within the viewer.
trans-unit.target: 뷰어 내에 포함된 활성 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView" /> 개체의 읽기 전용 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> provides a viewport for a particular page of content (represented by an underlying <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage>).
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> 뷰포트 특정 콘텐츠 페이지에 대 한 제공 (로 표현 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage>).

trans-unit.source: The set of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> objects represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews%2A> property is used by the viewer in order to display content.
trans-unit.target: 집합이 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> 으로 표현 되는 개체는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews%2A> 콘텐츠를 표시 하기 위해 속성 뷰어 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The master page corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> object (in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews%2A> collection) that includes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A> attached property with a value of **true**.
trans-unit.target: 마스터 페이지에 해당 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> 개체 (에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews%2A> 컬렉션)를 포함 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A> 연결 된 속성의 값을 가진 **true**합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A>.

Occurs when the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView" /> items associated with this viewer (represented by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews" /> property) changes.
trans-unit.target: 이 뷰어와 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView" /> 항목(<see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews" /> 속성으로 표시됨)의 컬렉션이 변경되면 발생합니다.

trans-unit.source: Causes the viewer to jump to the previous page of the current document (represented by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document" /> property).
trans-unit.target: 뷰어가 현재 문서(<see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document" /> 속성으로 표시됨)의 이전 페이지로 점프하도록 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Invokes a standard **Print** dialog which can be used to print the contents of the viewer and configure printing preferences.
trans-unit.target: 뷰어의 콘텐츠를 인쇄하고 인쇄 기본 설정을 구성하는 데 사용할 수 있는 표준 **인쇄** 대화 상자를 호출합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following figure shows an example of a standard **Print** dialog.
trans-unit.target: 다음 그림은 표준의 예가 **인쇄** 대화 상자.

trans-unit.source: Note that the specific appearance of the **Print** dialog may vary depending on the hosting computer's configuration.
trans-unit.target: 특정 모양을 **인쇄** 대화 호스팅 컴퓨터의 구성에 따라 다를 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: ![Screenshot: Print dialog box](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-print.png "Screenshot: Print dialog box")
trans-unit.target: ![스크린 샷: 인쇄 대화 상자](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-print.png "스크린 샷: 인쇄 대화 상자")

trans-unit.source: A dependency object on which to set the value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage" />.
The new value to set the property to.
Sets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage" /> attached property on a specified dependency object.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 종속성 개체에 대한 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage" /> 연결된 속성을 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The master page corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> object (in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews%2A> collection) that includes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A> attached property with a value of **true**.
trans-unit.target: 마스터 페이지에 해당 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> 개체 (에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews%2A> 컬렉션)를 포함 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A> 연결 된 속성의 값을 가진 **true**합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A>.
Raised if *element* is **null**.
An object that specifies the type of service object to get.
trans-unit.target: 가져올 서비스 개체의 형식을 지정하는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 이 형식 또는 멤버는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 인프라를 지원하며 사용자 코드에서 직접 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: A service object of type <paramref name="serviceType" />.
An object to add as a child.
This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 이 형식 또는 멤버는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 인프라를 지원하며 사용자 코드에서 직접 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: A string to add to the object.
This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 이 형식 또는 멤버는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 인프라를 지원하며 사용자 코드에서 직접 사용할 수 없습니다.
